items.question: What are the NFTs?
items.answer: NFTs (non-fungible tokens) are unique digital objects stored on the blockchain. They can be music, code, memes, memories â€“ anything that can be owned and verified. No copies. No takes. Just you and the chain.

items.question: How do I get NFTs?
items.answer: You can get NFTs by purchasing them on marketplaces, joining drops, or participating in community events.

items.question: How can we buy your NFTs?
items.answer: Our NFTs are available on selected marketplaces. Follow announcements to catch drops and sales.

items.question: Who are the team behind the project?
items.answer: We are a collective of artists, developers, and visionaries building the future of digital ownership.
